column1: Saint Malo;Hôtel Le Croiseur Ginette - Entièrement rénové;"Located right in the centre of Saint-Malo

column2: with a meticulous decor composed mainly of objects found throughout the region. Just renovated

column6: a bar

column2: right in the heart of the ramparts of Saint-Malo intra-muros. The Saint-Vincent esplanade is just a stone's throw away
column3: as is the bus to Mont-Saint-Michel and a 20-minute walk from the train station
column4: while the ferry terminal is just 10 minutes from Jersey and Guernsey. The Palais du Grand Large is also a 600-metre walk away.

column1: Our non-smoking rooms are equipped with free WiFi
column2: a bathroom with shower or bath
column3: certified organic products
column4: a connected TV and quality bedding for a pleasant and relaxing stay.

column1: Breakfast is served at the hotel

column3: shops and a thalassotherapy centre nearby to complement your stay.

column1: We offer a few parking spaces at €20 per day in a secure underground car park located inside the city walls. It's an ideal location
column2: provided your vehicle isn't too large: the streets of Saint-Malo are better suited to compact cars. During high season
column3: some streets become pedestrianised
column4: which can make access more difficult. Nothing insurmountable
column5: but it's best to have a little patience and
